dt: {bc}the top or back of the head
{bc}the broad or flat end of a striking tool (such as a hammer)
{bc}the casting or recording of the votes of a body of persons
{bc}the place where votes are cast or recorded
{bc}the period of time during which votes may be cast at an election
{bc}a questioning or canvassing of persons selected at random or by quota to obtain information or opinions to be analyzed
{bc}a record of the information so obtained

et: Middle English {it}pol, polle{/it}, from Middle Low German
shortdef: the top or back of the head

dt: {bc}to cut off or cut short the hair or wool of {bc}{sx|crop||}, {sx|shear||}
{bc}to cut off or cut short (a material, such as wool)
{bc}to cut off or back the top of (something, such as a tree)
{bc}to cut off or cut short the horns of (cattle)
{bc}to receive and record the votes of
{bc}to request each member of to declare a vote individually
{bc}to question or canvass in a poll
{bc}to check (devices, such as several computer terminals sharing a single line) in sequence for messages waiting to be transmitted
{bc}to cast one's vote at a poll

shortdef: to cut off or cut short the hair or wool of : crop, shear
to cut off or cut short (a material, such as wool)
to cut off or back the top of (something, such as a tree); specifically : pollard

dt: {bc}a tax of a fixed amount per person levied on adults and often linked to the right to vote

shortdef: a tax of a fixed amount per person levied on adults and often linked to the right to vote

dt: {bc}a deed (as to change one's name) made and executed by only one party

et: {et_link|deed:1|deed:1} + {it}poll{/it}, adjective, having the edges cut even rather than indented, from {et_link|poll:2|poll:2}
shortdef: a deed (as to change one's name) made and executed by only one party

dt: {bc}a poll taken (as by news media) of voters leaving the voting place that is usually used for predicting the winners

shortdef: a poll taken (as by news media) of voters leaving the voting place that is usually used for predicting the winners

dt: {bc}any of a breed of large hornless red beef cattle of English origin

shortdef: any of a breed of large hornless red beef cattle of English origin

dt: {bc}an activity in which many people are asked the same questions in order to find out what most people think about something

dt.t: An {it}opinion poll{/it} showed that he was favored to win the election.

shortdef: an activity in which many people are asked the same questions in order to find out what most people think about something

dt: {bc}a North American warbler ({it}Dendroica striata{/it}) with the male having a black cap when in breeding plumage

shortdef: a North American warbler (Dendroica striata) with the male having a black cap when in breeding plumage

dt: {bc}an unofficial vote taken (as at a chance gathering) to indicate the relative strength of opposing candidates or issues

shortdef: an unofficial vote taken (as at a chance gathering) to indicate the relative strength of opposing candidates or issues —called also straw poll
